評価.教科書Required texts0:
1. The Globalization of World Politics,” by John Baylis, Steve Smith, and Patricia Owens,  (Oxford University Press, 2020).* 
This book is available at the university bookstore, on Amazon, and a copy is also being held on reserve at the SIS library (second floor of the G-IS Building). Note: Students who are not able to access this book in person on campus or unable to purchase this book can instead go to the Amazon Japan website and check the free sample of this book to complete the reading assignments.

2. de Soete, Francois, "The Trump Presidency, the Coronavirus, and the New America: Can the U.S. Military Still Preserve the Status Quo in East Asia?" (The Journal of International Studies, 2021) - Available on this course's LUNA page.

3. 2. de Soete, Francois, "Trump, Biden, and U.S. Foreign Policy: Analyzing the Role of the Modern Presidency on America's Standing in the World" (The Journal of International Studies, 2022) - Available on this course's LUNA page.
